text.p: FUTURE RANGE/DAY SPPRT RSTNC RSI-9 MA-5 MA-25
OUTLOOK OF BOJ OPERATION AT 0020 GMT: injection of 100 bln yen
*Key September 10-year Japanese government bond (JGB) futures contract is likely to consolidate at around 124.00 on Tuesday after two days of gains.
*Topside seen capped at 124.20, where profit-taking emerged on Monday, and then at a resistance point of 124.37. But downside seen underpinned by steady buying in cash bonds.
